toolbar-icons.toggle-automations.name: Toggle Fishbot
config.keybinds.name: Keybinds
config.keybinds.toggle-automations.name: Toggle Automation
config.keybinds.toggle-automations.toolt: Pressing this key toggles enabled fishing automations on and off.
config.automations.name: Automations
config.automations.tooltip: Here you can configure what you would like Fishbot to automate for you when enabled.
config.automations.auto-cast.name: Auto-Cast
config.automations.auto-hit.name: Auto-Hit
config.automations.auto-play.name: Auto-Play Minigame
config.automations.auto-stow.name: Auto-Stow Fish
config.automations.auto-loot.name: Auto-Loot Treasure
config.automations.auto-eat.name: Auto-Eat
config.automations.auto-eat.tooltip: When disabled, automatically pause the game at low energy.
config.automations.cast-distance.name: Cast Distance
config.automations.auto-eat-max-sgpe.too: Will pause instead of eating if all available food exceeds this Sell Price to Energy threshold. (e.g. 1.93 for an iridium chub with the Fisher profession)
config.automations.auto-eat-first-food.t: Eat the first food item in your inventory instead of the one with the lowest sGPE.
config.automations.pause-after-time.name: Pause after
config.automations.pause-after-time.tool: Once per day, pause after this time (24h format). Use 02:00 to disable.
config.automations.always-enabled.name: Always Enabled
config.automations.always-enabled.toolti: Always run selected automations, without showing the HUD message. Automatic Casting must be toggled seperately to avoid getting stuck in a fishing loop.
config.utility.name: Utility
config.utility.tooltip: Small features to improve your fishing experience.
config.utility.bubble-radar.name: Bubble Radar
config.utility.bubble-radar.tooltip: Indicates the direction of active bubbles on with an arrow near the center of the screen.
config.minigame-strategies.name: Minigame Strategies
config.minigame-strategies.tooltip: Here you can decide on which strategy to use and fine-tune its values.
config.minigame-strategies.any.tooltip: You can fine tune the variables of this fishing strategy here.
config.minigame-strategies.fishing-autom: Target fish position in N frames of continued linear movement. Use 0 to disable. (inaccurate, but helps track fast targets)
Keep target within the given portion of the fishing bar when offsetting towards the center of the track. 0 keeps target centered. (Fish are more likely to move towards the center)
Target fish and treasure if they fit within the given portion of the fishing bar. Use 0.0 to avoid dual targeting.
Prioritize treasure if the capture progress exceeds this threshold. Use 1.0 to ignore treasure.
Prioritize fish if the capture progress falls below this threshold. This value needs to be smaller than FA_PrioTreasureAbove.
Minimum target velocity when tracking fish. Applied when bar is on target.
Maximum bar velocity towards bottom edge when near it, lower values mitigate bouncing.
Maximum fishing bar velocity, lower values mitigate overshoot.
How far from the edge the Max Speed Near Bottom starts to take effect, higher values mitigate bouncing.
